title: 金鯱賞の後に・再起、躍進

text.jpText:
レースを終えて戻ってきた彼女は、
心に残る“綺麗な景色”が見られたと、
珍しく、興奮気味に語った。
text.enText:
When she returned after the race, she was 
unusually excited, saying that she had seen a 
"beautiful view" that would stay in her mind 
for a long time. She returned from the race 
with a rare sense of excitement, saying that 
she had seen "beautiful scenery" that would 
stay in her mind.

text.jpText:
このレースは多くのウマ娘に影響を与えた。
彼女たちの心に火を付けるという……
大きな影響を。
text.enText:
This race has influenced many horsegirl. 
The…… great impact of igniting a fire in the 
hearts of these girls.
